Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle with bottleneck. It has a wide mouth, short neck and unstable base with convex bottom. Orangey-coloured paste and surface with reddish coating. The piece has a painted decoration consisting of white bands and dark red lines and somewhat narrower bands, forming a grille pattern, completed with white and black circles inside the grille.
